data.name: ImageControl_Display_Key
data.value: Image Control

data.name: ImageControl_Desc_Key
data.value: An image control for use with Multiple Lines of Text field to display images on the form

data.name: Field_Display_Key
data.value: Field

data.name: Field_Desc_Key
data.value: Multiple Lines of Text field that will use the control

data.name: Length_Display_Key
data.value: Length

data.name: Length_Desc_Key
data.value: Length of the image content entered to the control

data.name: ImageBorder_Display_Key
data.value: Image Border

data.name: ImageBorder_Desc_Key
data.value: Enable or disable a border around the image in the control

data.name: ImageBorder_Yes_Display_Key
data.value: Yes

data.name: ImageBorder_Yes_Desc_Key
data.value: Displays a border around the image

data.name: ImageBorder_No_Display_Key
data.value: No

data.name: ImageBorder_No_Desc_Key
data.value: Does not display a border around the image

data.name: ImageMaxHeightCss_Display_Key
data.value: Image Maximum height (CSS String)

data.name: ImageMaxHeightCss_Desc_Key
data.value: Use this property to enter a string value that will be used to limit the maximum height of the image, for example: "50rem" or "400px". Otherwise leave this empty.

data.name: DragImageHere_message
data.value: Drag and drop an image here

data.name: ClickToClear_message
data.value: Clear

data.name: NoFileError_message
data.value: No file was found in the drag and drop.

data.name: MultipleFileError_message
data.value: Only dragging/dropping one file is supported.

data.name: FieldLengthError_message
data.value: Image content is greater than the size of the field. The size of the field should be increased, or a smaller image should be used.

data.name: MaxFieldLengthError_message
data.value: Image content is greater than the maximum size of a Multiple Lines of Text field. A smaller image is required.

data.name: PickFileButton_message
data.value: Pick file

data.name: OnlyPickOneFile_message
data.value: Only pick one file

data.name: ProcessingLargeImagePleaseWait_message
data.value: Processing large image... please wait a moment

data.name: NoImageProvided_message
data.value: No image provided.
